title: #049 - Legacy-Building, YouTube Success, & Black Fatherhood with Glen Henry
itunes:title: #049 - Legacy-Building, YouTube Success, & Black Fatherhood with Glen Henry
description:
Glen Henry is a YouTube sensation with over 150K subscribers. His vision was to share the realities of parenthood and his authentic approach to sharing his story has created a family outside of his own among his subscribers. In today's episode I speak to him about fatherhood, transparency, and how he launched his Youtube channel. 

If you’re an entrepreneur who wants to step into your voice and brand online, if you want to take your YouTube channel to the next level, or if you want to build a legacy with your work, this is the episode for you.
